reviewText:
YES!!!!!!!!!!! BOX DREAMT OF A GAME NAMED AFTER HIM AND IT DID COME TRUE! THE BOX IS THE PERFECT GAME FOR THOSE PEOPLE WHO WISH TO PLAY A CASUAL YET 420YOLO COLORFUL MLG EXPERIENCE! ROLL A SMALL LOOKING SPHERE SHAPED LIKE A BOX IN SEVERAL BOX SHAPED PLATFORMS AND REACH YOUR WAY TO THE TELEPORTATION WALL MADE OUT OF COLORED PIXELATED BOXES!!!!!!!!

BOX RATES GAME 5/2 = 2.5 REVERSING IT MEANS 5.2 AKA 52


ONE WITH SPHERE, ONE WITH BOX!


P.S: MUSIC IS SO GOOD, BOX SAYS IZ LIKE PLAYING A GAME OF BOX!

reviewText: I've had around 50+ hours playing The BoX as I was a alpha and beta tester for the game. I can honestly tell you that this challenging, fun, colourful, and charming platformer is one of the best games you can get on steam for 6$ and is an absolute steal at that price. You will find very little platforms with as much content, challenges, and replayability. While you might be thinking to yourself  but how can a box and some squares be that good" ? Well
date: why don't you buy to find out ;)! This platformer will not let you down!"

reviewText: Just got this game and I've been playing non stop for like an hour and a half...send help. It's addicting. Music is pretty awesome too! 10/10

reviewText: I dont normally go for platformers but this game drew me in almost imediately with its beautiful stages, and music. There is so much color and vibrant life to this game, as you try to guide yourself through a world of boxes. Hooked almost imediately. Well made. 10/10 would play again.

reviewText: A very colorful bang for your buck. I like how it eases you into the style of game play with a few simple obsticles on the first 3 levels. worth a buy i see my self playing this when ever waiting for friends to get online or just have time to burn.

reviewText: The box is a colourful game that is an amazing platformer that is amazing. Also if you want to be negative why what's the point this game is awesome.

Worst game I have ever played!
CONS:
-No microtransactions (like it's 2016 already wtf catch up)
-Terrible voice acting (I mean the ball didn't say ♥♥♥♥ the whole time)
-Easy and comprehensive controls (What is the point of having a keyboard with 1000 buttons if you only use like 5?)
-Music was constant (Sometimes I just want peace and quiet!)
-Game was challenging (I wanted to feel like a winner with minimal effort!)
Pros:
-Pretty colours.
